text: Made for Each Other is a 1971 American romantic comedy movie directed by Robert B. Bean and stars Paul Sorvino, Renee Taylor, Joseph Bologna, Olympia Dukakis, Candice Azzara, Louis Zorich. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Plot == Pandora and Giggy take part in a group therapy session. The shy girl and the smooth talker, who seem to have nothing in common, fall in love and create the event that will upset everyone around them. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1971 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:Movies set in New York City
title: Made for Each Other (1971 movie)
